properties.Name: ProceedsSettlementMethod
properties.Description:
The proceeds from life insurance policies can be paid in many ways dependent upon the choice of the policyowner or the beneficiary.

There are five settlement options available:
-  Lump-Sum Cash Option
-  Interest-Only Option
-  Fixed Period Option
-  Life Income Options
-  Fixed Amount Option

LUMP-SUM CASH OPTION
All policy proceeds are to be paid in a single lump-sum cash settlement.

INTEREST-ONLY OPTION
The insurance company holds the proceeds for a specified period and at regular intervals pays the beneficiary a guaranteed rate on the proceeds.   The proceeds themselves are paid at the end of the specified period in cash or under one of the settlement options.

FIXED PERIOD OPTION
The insurance company pays the beneficiary equal amounts of money at regular intervals over a specific period.   This option in effect pays out principal and interest earned.    The amount of each installment payment is determined upon the length of the desired period of income.   The longer the period of income the smaller each payment will be.   Conversely, the shorter the period, the larger each payment will be.

LIFE INCOME OPTIONS
There are many forms of Life Income Option in which the beneficiary receives a guaranteed income for life no matter how long he or she lives.   The principal and interest are paid together and calculated to guarantee a lifetime.    Should the   principal be used up, the   income payments will continue as long as the   beneficiary lives.    

Life Income Settlement Options:
- Cash Refund Option
- Installment Refund Option
- Joint And Survivor Option
- Life With Period Certain Option
- Period Certain Option
- Straight Life Income Option

FIXED AMOUNT OPTION
The   policy proceeds plus interest are used to pay out a specified amount of income at regular intervals as long the   proceeds allow.   The   amount of each income payment is fixed with the   period depending upon the   payment amount.    Excess interest is credited and extends the   payment period with the   payments remaining the   same.

Columns.Name: ProceedsSettlementMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Proceeds Settlement Method.

Columns.Name: ProceedsSettlementMethodName
Columns.Description: The name of a Proceeds Settlement Method.

Columns.Name: ProceedsSettlementMethodDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Proceeds Settlement Method.
